text:
Happy 1-year, Ryan Seacrest and Kelly Ripa! The cohosts are celebrating their 1-year work anniversary today, Tuesday, May 1.

Last year, on May 1, 2017, Ripa announced on-air that our very own Seacrest would officially be joining the Live family as her new co-host after a total of 67 celebrities helped guest host the show following former cohost Michael Strahan‘s exit.

In honor of the big day — which also marks Kelly and her husband Mark Consuelos’ 22nd wedding anniversary — the duo exchanged gifts.

Kelly gifted Seacrest a juice “cake” and he gave her flowers.
title: Ryan and Kelly Ripa Celebrate Their 1-Year Work Anniversary!
